text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Manica | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Province | image_skyline = Looking down from Mount Zembe.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = Looking down from Mount Zembe | image_flag = | flag_size = | flag_alt = | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_size = | shield_alt = | image_blank_emblem = | blank_emblem_type = | blank_emblem_size = | blank_emblem_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Manica Province in Mozambique 2018.svg | mapsize = 250px | map_alt = | map_caption = Manica, Province of Mozambique | image_map1 = | mapsize1 = | map_alt1 = | map_caption1 = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Mozambique | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Chimoio | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | leader_title1 = | leader_name1 = | total_type = | unit_pref = | area_magnitude = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 62272 | area_total_sq_mi = | area_total_dunam = | area_land_km2 = | area_land_sq_mi = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_sq_mi = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | elevation_max_m = 2436 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1945994 | population_as_of = 2017 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_density_sq_mi = | population_est = | pop_est_as_of = | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 22xx | area_code = (+258) 251 | website = | footnotes = | official_name = }} Manica is a province of Mozambique. The capital city is Chimoio. The Save River creates the southern border. There is also the Zambezi river in the northeast. The highest mountain in Mozambique, Mount Binga (2436 m), is in this province near the border with Zimbabwe. ==Districts== Manica Province is divided into 12 districts: *Báruè District *Chimoio District *Gondola District *Guro District *Macate District *Machaze District *Macossa District *Manica District *Mossurize District *Sussundenga District *Tambara District *Vanduzi District ==References== Category:Provinces of Mozambique
title: Manica Province
